quote: That was the secret of the salvation he brought, that was the light he shone into the darkness; and that was why they wanted to kill him. Because they preferred the darkness to the light.
quote_letters: THAT WAS THE SECRET OF THE SALVATION HE BROUGHT THAT WAS THE LIGHT HE SHONE INTO THE DARKNESS AND THAT WAS WHY THEY WANTED TO KILL HIM BECAUSE THEY PREFERRED THE DARKNESS TO THE LIGHT
